            A part of good science is to see what everyone else can see but to think what no one else has ever said ~ Amos Tversky
            
            Education
            Central Michigan University | MA, Economics | Aug 2010 - May 2012
            Univ of North Carolina, Chapel Hill | BS, Business Administration & Minor, Anthropology | Aug 2002 - May 2006
            
            
            Career
            TechSmith | Manager of Data Analysis and Data Privacy | Dec 2019 - Present
            Consumers Energy | Data Scientist | Oct 2018 - Dec 2019
            Jackson National Life | Sr Operations Data Analyst | Mar 2012 - Sept 2018
            Kellogg’s | Intern, Sales Analytics | May 2011 - Mar 2012
